column4: This is the phpMyAdmin wiki. With this wiki the phpMyAdmin team hopes to make it easier to let contributors add their knowledge and help to the phpMyAdmin project. Feel free to edit or add new articles related to phpMyAdmin (we reserve the right to take legal actions against spammers). Or just search for answer to your questions. This wiki is a source for users and developers documentation and
everybody is welcome to improve it. To ask for help please use the Help Forum, to report a bug use the bug tracker (after looking there for already known or fixed issues).
